description: User interface widgets for employee management including schedule editing, PIN management, and employee-related UI components

components.EmployeeScheduleEditor: Comprehensive employee schedule management widget with manager authentication and weekly schedule editing capabilities.

rules: Manager authentication integration requiring manager PIN before allowing schedule modifications for security compliance.
Weekly schedule management with Monday-Friday default working days and weekend days off configuration.
DriftScheduleRepository integration for schedule persistence and retrieval with proper error handling.
Time picker integration using Flutter's native TimePicker with branded theming and minute-based storage.
Day-off toggle functionality allowing managers to mark employees as off for specific days of the week.
Default schedule initialization with business hours (9 AM - 6 PM) and weekend off configuration.
Schedule display widget showing formatted time ranges with day names and professional styling.
Modal dialog interface for schedule editing with 500px width and scrollable content for usability.
Real-time schedule updates with callback integration for parent component notification.
Error handling with user-friendly messages and professional error display styling.
Loading states with progress indicators during save operations and data loading.
Professional time formatting using repository utility methods for consistent time display.
Schedule validation ensuring all days have appropriate time configurations.
Responsive layout with proper spacing and professional Material Design integration.
Success feedback with SnackBar notifications confirming schedule save operations.
State management with proper loading, error, and success state handling throughout widget lifecycle.
Manager authorization wrapper ensuring only authorized personnel can modify work schedules.
Time conversion utilities handling minute-based storage and TimeOfDay picker integration.
Database integration with WeeklySchedule model supporting both working and off-day configurations.
Professional UI design with consistent theming, borders, and color schemes throughout schedule editor.
